original_title: Pete Townshend Live in New York Featuring Psychoderelict
overview: A performance from Townshend's first North American solo tour was broadcast live from the theatre of the Brooklyn Academy of Music in New York in August 1993. The concert was in three parts: an opening session of eight songs, a complete performance of Psychoderelict and an encore of a further five songs.
title: Pete Townshend Live in New York Featuring Psychoderelict
